Verses: 1 pinnum elikoo maaRuththaramaaga:
2 gnaanigaLE, en vaarththaigaLaik kELungaL; aRivaaLigaLE, enakku sevikodungaL.
3 vaayaanadhu pOjanaththai rusipaarkkiRadhupOla, seviyaanadhu vaarththaigaLai sOdhiththuppaarkkum.
4 namakkaaga nyaayamaanadhaith therindhukoLvOmaaga; nanmai innadhendru namakkuLLE aRindhukoLvOmaaga.
5 yObu: naan needhimaan; dhEvan en nyaayaththaith thaLLivittaar endrum,
6 nyaayam ennidaththil irundhum naan poiyanendru eNNappadugiREn; meeRudhal illaadhirundhum, ambinaal enakku uNdaana kaayam aaRaadhadhaayirukkiRadhendrum sonnaarE.
7 yObaippOlavE, pariyaasampaNNudhalaith thaNNeeraippOl kudiththu,
8 akkiramakkaararOdE koodikkoNduï¿½, dhunmaarkkarOdE thirigiRavan yaar?
9 eppadiyenil, dhEvanmEl piriyam vaikkiRadhu manushanukkup prayOjanam alla endraarE.
10 aagaiyaal buththimaangaLE, enakku sevikodungaL; akkiramam dhEvanukkum, aneedhi sarvavallavarukkum dhooramaayirukkiRadhu.
11 manushanudaiya seygaikkuth thakkadhai avanukku sarikkatti, avanavan nadakkaikkuththakkadhaaga avanavanukku palanaLikkiRaar.
12 dhEvan aniyaayan cheyyaamalum, sarvavallavar needhiyaip purattaamalum irukkiRadhu meyyE.
13 boomiyinmEl manushanukku adhigaaram koduththavar yaar? poochchakkaram muzhudhaiyum ozhunguppaduththinavar yaar?
14 avar thammudaiya irudhayaththai avanukku virOdhamaagath thiruppinaaraagil, avanudaiya aaviyaiyum avanudaiya suvaasaththaiyum thammidaththil izhuththukkoLLuvaar.
15 appadiyE maamsamaana yaavum Egamaai jeeviththuppOm, manushan thooLukkuth thirumbuvaan.
16 umakku uNarvirundhaal idhaik kELum, en vaarththaigaLin saththaththukku sevikodum.
17 needhiyaip pagaikkiRa oruvan aaLakkoodumO? magaa needhibararaik kutrappaduththuveerO?
18 oru raajaavaip paarththu, nee pollaadhavan endrum, adhipadhigaLaip paarththu, neengaL akkiramakkaarar endrum sollaththagumO?
19 ippadiyirukka, prabukkaLin mugaththaippaaraamalum, Ezhaiyaippaarkkilum aisuvariyavaanai adhigamaai eNNaamalum irukkiRavarai nOkki ippadi sollalaamaa? ivargaL ellaarum avar karangaLin kiriyaiyE.
20 ippadippattavargaL sadidhiyil saavaargaL; janangaL paadhijaamaththil kalangi ozhindhupOvaargaL; kaaNaadha kaiyinaal balavandhar azhindhupOvaargaL.
21 avarudaiya kaNgaL manusharudaiya vazhigaLai nOkkiyirukkiRadhu; avargaLudaiya nadaigaLaiyellaam avar paarkkiRaar.
22 akkiramakkaarar oLiththukkoLLaththakka andhagaaramumillai, maraNa iruLumillai.
23 manushan dhEvanOdE vazhakkaadumpadi avar avanmEl minjinadhondraiyum sumaththamaattaar.
24 aaraaindhu mudiyaadha nyaayamaai avar vallamaiyuLLavargaLai noRukki, vERE manusharai avargaL SthaanaththilE niRuththugiRaar.
25 avargaL kiriyaigaLai avar aRindhavaraanapadiyaal, avargaL nasungippOgaththakkadhaai raakkaalaththil avargaLaik kavizhththuppOdugiRaar.
26 avargaL avarai vittup pinvaangi, avarudaiya ellaa vazhigaLaiyum uNarndhukoLLaamal pOnapadiyinaalum,
27 eLiyavargaLin kookkural avaridaththil sErumpadi seydhadhinaalum, siRumaiyaanavanudaiya kookkuralaik kEtkiRa avar,
28 ellaarum paarkkumpadi avargaLai dhunmaarkkarendru adikkiRaar.
29 maayakkaaran aaLaadhapadikkum, janangaL sikkikkoLLappadaadhapadikkum,
30 oru janaththukkaanaalum oru manushanukkaanaalum, avar samaadhaanaththai aruLinaal yaar kalangappaNNuvaan? avar thamadhu mugaththai maRaiththaal avaraik kaaNgiRavan yaar?
31 naan dhaNdikkappattEn; naan inip paavancheyyamaattEn.
32 naan kaaNaadha kaariyaththai neer enakkup pOdhiyum, naan aniyaayam paNNinEnaanaal, naan ini appadi seyvadhillai endru dhEvanai nOkki sollaththagumE.

33 neer appadi seyyamaattOmengiRapadiyinaal, ummOdirukkiRavargaLil oruvanai umakkup padhilaaga adhai seyya solveerO? naan alla, neerE therindhukoLLavENdum; allavendraal, neer aRindhirukkiRadhai sollum.
34 yObu aRivillaamal pEsinaar; avar vaarththaigaL gnaanamuLLavaigaL allavendru,
35 buththiyuLLa manushar en patchamaaip pEsuvaargaL; gnaanamuLLa manushanum enakku sevikoduppaan.
36 akkiramakkaarar sonna maRuuththaravugaLinimiththam yObu mutramudiya sOdhikkappadavENdiyadhE en abEtchai.
37 thammudaiya paavaththOdE meeRudhalaik koottinaar; avar engaLukkuLE kaikotti, dhEvanukku virOdhamaaith thammudaiya vaarththaigaLai migudhiyaaga vasaniththaar endraan.
